titleStmt.title: Mudrārākṣasa with Dhuṇḍi’s commentary and Kathāśeṣa

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Manuscript is copy of some manuscript written in the śaka era1635: in the Year Jaya. The year of this manuscript seems to be 1877 as mentioned on the front folio. The colophon mentioned in the published edition of 1915 is same as the manuscript. Front cover in Granth kuṃbhakoṇapurasthavidyāśālā yāḥ adhyetuḥ mahāliṃgasutoḥ naṭeśasya mudrārākṣasaṃ savyā khyānaṃ [na dhu? Illegible one] (it could be sign for month or name of a Year)1877 asyāṃ tārikāsaṃstarebhyaḥ caturtha tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ likhitā

msItem.title: Mudrārākṣasa with Dhuṇḍi’s commentary with Kathāśeṣa
msItem.author: Dhuṇḍi
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 sindhūrārūṇagaṇḍamaṇḍalamadāmodabhramatbhṛṅgiṇā jhaṅkāreṇa kalena karṇamurajadhvānena mandreṇa ca tattauryatrikarītimeti śirasasśaśvanmadāndolanaṃ
1v 2 yasya śrīgaṇanāyakassutanutāñśreyāṃsi bhūyāṃsī vaḥ.. athedaṃ nātakaṃ saṅgalakṣmaṇanirupaṇapurassaraṃ vyākhyāyate . mūlaṃ - dhanyākeyaṃ sthi 1v 3 tā te śirasi
1v 6 ……… ṭīkā atra śrīmānviśākhadattanā
1v 7 kaviḥ prārīpsitasya nāṭakasya nirvighnaparisamāptīpracayasiddhyarthaṃ sveṣṭadeṭatāguṇasaṃkīrtanapūrvakāśīrvacanarūpamaṅga
msItem.explicit: 97v 10 ityādini vacanāni draṣṭavyāni gaṅgāstutau bhavatyādairanayorabhedabhaktiprārthanā kṛtaṃ bhūyāt bhāktiravicyutāhariharāścaitātmikā śāśvatīti

support.p: Thick black palm leaf as cover guard.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 3 blank folio, 101 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.

handNote.desc: Shape of letter a and ka is confusing. Clusters are very clumsy.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written on 1v in the left margin. On 99v śrīḥ in the left margin.

origin.origDate: The manuscript mentions Samvatsar 1635 and no other information about month or the day and date. According to the information on front cover the year mentioned is 1877 and according to Samvatsar it is 1713. It seems that the Samvatsar year mentioned indicates the year of the source of the manuscript.

listBibl.bibl:
Bombay sanskrit Series No. XXVII
Mudrārākṣasa by Viśākhadatta with the commentary of Ḍhuṇḍhirāja. Edited with Critical and Explanatory notes by Kāśinātha Trimbak Telang Fifth Edition 1000 copies Revised by Prof V S Ghāte Published by Tukārāma jivājī, Bombay 1915.

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate word. The transcription of the Kathāśeṣa is added in the text transcription because it is part of the Mudrārākṣa and it comes after the colophon in the manuscript but actually cannnot be added in the same field.

TEI.text:
98r 2 budho ḍhuṇḍhīrnāmnā jagati vidito lakṣmaRasudhīmaṇe śrīmatvyāsānvayajaladhī candrasya tanayaḥ sphuṭaṃ sāṅgaṃ vyākhyaṃ 98r 3 nayaguṇavidastryaṃbakavibhorniyogāt prauḍhārthyaṃ budhaguṇamudhe nāṭakamida atra nāṭake caturtheṅ 98r 4 ke kaviradbhutataracāṇakyanītiviṣayakasvasaṃvidhānāracanākleśamanubhāvya pramodamanubhuvantaḥ sārasā svahṛdayā jagati 98r 5 dūrlabhā iti manvānaḥ svayameva svasya nāṭakeyaṃ saṃvidhānakleśaṃ rākṣasavacanavyājena prastauti sma . Kāryopa 98r 6 kṣevamādau tanumapi racayan tasya vistāramicchan bījānāṃ garbhitānāṃ phalamanigrahan gūḍhamutbhedayan ścākuryāt budhyā? 98r 7 vimarśśa prasṛtyamapi punaḥ ssaṃharan kāryyajātaṃ? kartā vā nāṭakānāmimanubhavati kleśasmasmanvidho vānutyevaṃnnāṭakiyyacatuṣṣa 98r 8 ṭyaṃgaṃ lakṣaṇānusarakavihṛdayābhyimatārthāviṣkaraṇaprayāsopi vyākhyāturanumodayitavyassuhṛdayairiti prārthayā 98r 9 maḥ kartedannāṭakasyātbhutarasavilasatsaṃvidhānapravīṇaḥ kleśaṃ kauṭīlyanītyau bahulayamatanotlakṣaṇāḍhyairvacobhiḥ . thattlakṣyaitadaṃgā
98r 10 nusaraṇaviṣayāyāsamasmadvidhānāṃ rājaśrītryaṃbakāryyānumiti śuvihityaṃ vikṣya tuṣyantu santaḥ . śrīmadviśākhakavīvaryakṛtirmayaiṣā śrītryaṃbakānumiti
99v 1 śrīmānviśākhadattiye mudrākṣasanāṭake kathāpoddhātamācaṣṭe sandadhānāvabuddhaye .. nandāntaṃ kṣatriyakulamiti paurāṇaśāsanāt kalyād
101v 1 yyāsajjākhilaṃ rājyaṃ ānṛṇyaṃ svāminau mama iti protsāhya bahudhā dhīmān sāhasikāgraṇīḥ mauryaṃ jetumlecchabalai sandahyata
101 2 rākṣasam upotdhātotivṛttānt kathāyā evamīritam ataḥ paraṃ kaviryuktā nāṭakīyaṃ prayokṣyate . krūragrahaḥ sa ityasmin padye 101v 3 prastāvanāmukhai uktamarthaṃ viśeṣeṇa kavis prastuyate punaḥ .. hariḥ oṃ .. athāśeṣaṃ samā 101v 4 ptaṃ .. .. hariḥ oṃ .. śubhamastu śrīkṛṣṇārphaṇamastu … śrīkṛṣṇāyaparamātmane namaḥ 101v 5 śrīmate hayagrīvāyanamaḥ .. srīsarasvatyai namaḥ .. śrīyai namaḥ .. oṃ athāśeṣaṃ saṃoūrṇam .. 101v 6 yādṛśaṃ pustakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ mayā 101v 7 abaddhaṃ cāsubaddhaṃ ca mama (mayi) doṣo na vidyate .. 101v 8 kartedannāṭakasyātbhutarasavilasatsaṃvidhānapravīṇaḥ kleśaṃ kauṭīlyanītyau bahulayamatanotlakṣaṇāḍhyairvacobhiḥ . thattlakṣyaitadaṃgānusa 101v 9 raṇaviṣayāyāsamasmadvidhānāṃ rājaśrītryaṃbakāryyānumiti śuvihityaṃ vikṣya tuṣyantu santaḥ . ….. oṃ…..
